name: Create a Compartment
description: Walkthrough on creating compartments to logically separate, organize, and isolate your cloud resources.

steps.message: For the Jump Server tutorial we will create multiple resouces and show you how to create this common architecture in OCI. Please refer to the diagram for reference. In this tutorial we will guide you how to create a compartment for the Jump Server tutorial.</br>{{img-url:/images/tutorials/jump_server_load_balancer/jsnotionalarch.png}}

Click the menu button on top left.
{{img-url:/images/tutorials/menu.png}}

With the side menu open. Scroll down to "Identity" and click "Compartments".
{{img-url:/images/tutorials/idcompartment.png}}

In OCI you can create nested compartments. Root compartment is the default.
For now we are going to create a compartment under Root Compartment. Click the blue "Create Compartment" button on top. {{img-url:/images/tutorials/idcompartment.png}}
Tip: You can create subcompartments inside of compartments to create hierarchies that are six levels deep.

Enter the following required areas:
"Name" and "Description".
Please input your information accordingly. Tip: TAGS are for managing purposes use, we will learn about them later.

Click "Create Compartment" button and you will have your first sub compartment under root compartment.
{{img-url:/images/tutorials/idnested.png}}

You can proceed to next step 1.1 Create VCN
Tip: Remember to choose the new compartment when you create new resources.
